short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes from your text or URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows generating QR Code for current page and generating QR Code for your text. You can add your logo or photo to the QR Code, then can export the QR Code in many different sizes
Generate QR codes for website URLs with just 1 mouse click.

This extension does not require any special permissions. It is loaded only when you click the button. Therefore, it does not cause any unnecessary memory consumption and performance impact when not in use.
